title: Champion Masteries
body:
Hi Riot, the Champion Masteries have been out for a while and you see quiet a lot of mastery 5 champions. When will Level 6 and 7 be made available. I see that there are shown on the Champion Mastery Riot Support page, but wondering what you will be giving out when someone reaches level 6 and 7 and when it will be released. 

Your Dearest

RK

replies.body: No specific timeline yet, but you can find more information about the mastery systems coming [HERE](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/champion-mastery.html). Likely they will be released sometime after solo q has been implemented and dyna queue has settled down some more.
